short.ar: هل تحب العاب الورق؟ إذا كانت إجابتك نعم ، فستعجبك الكرة الملونة. هل أنت مستعد للعبة صعبة وممتعة؟

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like arcade games? If your answer is yes, you will like the Color ball. Are you ready for a very challenging and fun game?

A fun game that needs attention and talent to follow the color order demanded by the ball, and a great brain exercise. In this game there is a bouncing ball that can assume randomly five distinct colors, you must ensure that the platform has the exact ball color when it jumps, in another case you fail. Slowly the bouncing strength of the ball is increased, therefore raising the difficulty of the game. Make score as much as you can!

To swipe Install this extension to play the Color Ball Bounce game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
